languages.text: "Принято, Вольный Торговец. Ваше недовольство будет внесено в протокол встречи и рассмотрено в общем порядке. Теперь перейдем к цели вашей внеплановой инспекции".

"Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."
languages.original_text: "Принято, Вольный Торговец. Ваше недовольство будет внесено в протокол встречи и рассмотрено в общем порядке. Теперь перейдем к цели вашей внеплановой инспекции".

traits.locale_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to the general procedure. Now let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

"Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

languages.text: «Entendido, Comerciante. Se registrará su insatisfacción en las actas de esta reunión y se procesará con posterioridad según la normativa establecida. Ahora, pasemos al propósito de su inspección sin aviso previo».
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: «Entendido, Comerciante. Se registrará su insatisfacción en las actas de esta reunión y se procesará con posterioridad según la normativa establecida. Ahora, pasemos al propósito de su inspección sin aviso previo».

languages.text: “了解，行商浪人。你的不满情绪将会被记录在会议记录中，按照标准程序进行处理。至于现在，我们来谈谈你突然来访的目的吧。”
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: “了解，行商浪人。你的不满情绪将会被记录在会议记录中，按照标准程序进行处理。至于现在，我们来谈谈你突然来访的目的吧。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、わかりました。あなたの不満はこの会合の議事録に記録され、通常の手続きに従って処理されます。では、あなたが通達もなくやって来た目的に話題を移しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、わかりました。あなたの不満はこの会合の議事録に記録され、通常の手続きに従って処理されます。では、あなたが通達もなくやって来た目的に話題を移しましょう」

languages.text: « Dont acte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Votre insatisfaction sera dûment consignée dans les minutes de cet entretien et traitée selon la procédure en vigueur. Sur ce, revenons-en plutôt au motif de votre inspection inattendue. »
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: « Dont acte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Votre insatisfaction sera dûment consignée dans les minutes de cet entretien et traitée selon la procédure en vigueur. Sur ce, revenons-en plutôt au motif de votre inspection inattendue. »

languages.text: "Anlaşıldı Hür Tacir. Memnuniyetsizliğiniz, bu görüşmenin tutanaklarına geçirilecek ve genel prosedür gereğince ele alınacaktır. Habersiz incelemenizin amacına geçebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşıldı Hür Tacir. Memnuniyetsizliğiniz, bu görüşmenin tutanaklarına geçirilecek ve genel prosedür gereğince ele alınacaktır. Habersiz incelemenizin amacına geçebiliriz."

languages.text: "Ich nehme das zur Kenntnis, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Eure Unzufriedenheit mit diesem Treffen wird protokollarisch festgehalten und im Rahmen des üblichen Prozederes geprüft. Lasst uns nun über den Zweck Eurer unangekündigten Inspektion sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Acknowledged, Rogue Trader. Your dissatisfaction will be recorded in the minutes for this meeting and addressed according to general procedure. Now, let us move on to the purpose of your unannounced inspection."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme das zur Kenntnis, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Eure Unzufriedenheit mit diesem Treffen wird protokollarisch festgehalten und im Rahmen des üblichen Prozederes geprüft. Lasst uns nun über den Zweck Eurer unangekündigten Inspektion sprechen."
